DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to develop an efficient home-based polysomnography device, which allows, through GPRS,continuous real-time monitoring from the sleep lab based in the hospital, in order to decrease the failure rate of home-based recordings.
DOC.brief_title: Real-time Attended Home-polysomnography Through Telematic Data Transmission
DOC.criteria: clinical suspicion of OSA 18 y old restrictive respiratory disorders distance homehospital exceeding 30 Km.
